task.title: Delete text
task.shortdesc: CWRC-Writer templates open with pre-existing text. It may be easier to first delete the text (but not the tags) before adding your own text to the document.

step.cmd: Highlight the text that you would like to delete in the document.

step.note: Do not delete the highlighted text, this can delete the text and the structure tag.There currenty are inconsistencies with the editor that we are working to fix.
step.cmd: Begin to type in the text you would like to enter.
step.info: Option: You can also delete text manually by placing your cursor in the document and using your delete/backspace button on your keyboard.
